trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_SEQ_00<tab>Nigen is worried for her husband.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nigen's husband.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_TODO_01<tab>Use the thick ropes to capture two weakened steppe dzos.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_TODO_02<tab>Report to Nigen's husband.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_TODO_03<tab>Report to Nigen.

TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_000<tab>Hello again! My brother and sister are both doing very well thanks to your aid. There is actually something else I would like you to help me with should you have the time.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_001<tab>We are a tribe of nomads, periodically dismantling our tents and moving from area to area. Each time we require a group of steppe dzos to transport our homes.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_002<tab>My husband is currently trying to catch some to the south. He must be struggling otherwise he would have come back by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_003<tab>Please go and help him.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_004<tab>Please go and help my husband. You will find him to the south.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGENHUSBAND02772_000_010<tab>Oh, have you come to help? We will take care of this smaller dzo.

TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGENHUSBAND02772_000_011<tab>As you look a considerable amount stronger than any of us, could I ask you to catch two of the beasts? Weaken them first, and then tie them up with this rope.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGENHUSBAND02772_000_012<tab>Would you be able to catch two steppe dzos? Weaken them first, and then tie them up with this rope.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_020<tab>Were you able to find my husband? I am sure he would appreciate your help.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGENHUSBAND02772_000_040<tab>You are a natural! Thank you so much.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGENHUSBAND02772_000_041<tab>I will help guide the dzos back to Mol Iloh. By all means, please head back first. I am sure my wife would like to thank you as well.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_050<tab>Did everything go smoothly?
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_060<tab>Wonderful to hear. You were not injured by the dzos, were you?
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_061<tab>Capturing the beasts is never easy, but we have little choice. There is no way we alone could ever bear the weight of our tents.
TEXT_STMBDZ521_02772_NIGEN_000_062<tab>Please take this for your troubles. Thank you once again.
